title: Crypto Wallet Exodus Acquiring Grateful to Expand Stablecoin Payments in Latin America
contentSnippet: The deal will add stablecoin-based payment tools for merchants and gig workers as crypto payments are rapidly growing.

title: Rumble to Acquire Northern Data as Tether Commits $150 Million to Power AI Push
contentSnippet: Stablecoin giant Tether backs YouTube rival Rumble and has a controlling stake in Northern Data.

title: Jack Dorsey's Block Enables Bitcoin Payments for Millions of Square Sellers
contentSnippet: Payments firm Block is enabling no-fee Bitcoin payments for sellers worldwide via Square's point-of-sale platform.

title: Stellar’s XLM Rises 3.6%, Breaking Key Resistance Amid Bullish Signals
contentSnippet: XLM surged past the $0.3020 resistance on strong institutional volume, outperforming the crypto market as analysts eye a possible seven-year triangle breakout targeting $1.52.

title: HBAR Surge Signals Institutional Momentum Despite Late-Session Pullback
contentSnippet: The token’s 4.62% rally and strong volume confirmed growing institutional interest, though a sharp end-of-session reversal highlighted emerging resistance and short-term volatility.

title: ICP Falls 11.2% to $6.69 After Losing Key $7.00 Support
contentSnippet: Internet Computer (ICP) slides 11.2% to $6.69 after breaching key support at $7.00, with volume surging 94% above average amid heightened volatility.

title: Strategy Buys Bitcoin With Proceeds From Preferred Shares as Key Premium Evaporates
contentSnippet: Jim Chanos said he has closed his bet against Strategy’s Bitcoin premium.

title: Monad Unveils Tokenomics Ahead of Nov. 24 MON Token Airdrop
contentSnippet: A public sale of the MON token will begin on Coinbase’s Token Sales platform on Nov. 17 for 7.5% of the initial supply.

title: BitMine Stock Rises After Tom Lee’s Firm Buys the Dip, Adding $389 Million in Ethereum
contentSnippet: Ethereum treasury firm BitMine Immersion Technologies now holds over 3.5 million ETH, buying more ETH last week with the price down.

title: Crypto Majors Surge! US Gov may re-open soon! BTC back above $106k!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors surged following news of the U.S. government’s reopening, with Bitcoin (BTC) up 4% to $106,000, Ethereum (ETH) gaining 4% to $3,590, Binance Coin (BNB) rising 1% to $996, and Solana (SOL

title: WIF Surged 5% to $0.497 Before Retreating as Profit-Taking Emerged
contentSnippet: WIF broke above key resistance levels in volatile trading before institutional selling capped gains at session highs.

title: BONK Rises 1.7% as Breakout Momentum Holds
contentSnippet: BONK climbed to $0.00001332 after breaking above key resistance, with volume up 82% above daily averages, signaling continued short-term strength.

title: TON Price Stalls Below Resistance as Sellers Block Breakout
contentSnippet: Bulls are watching for a sustained move above $2.144 to potentially retest $2.154 highs, while bears are eyeing a break below $2.133

title: Bybit Said to Be in Talks to Buy South Korean Exchange Korbit: Report
contentSnippet: A Bybit spokesperson said the talks, reported by South Korea’s Maeil Business Newspaper, are “not within our knowledge.”

title: Tom Lee's BitMine Immersion Bought Last Week's Ether Dip, Adding 110K Tokens to Holdings
contentSnippet: The crypto treasury firm now owns 2.9% of the ETH supply and holds nearly $398 million in cash for more purchases.

title: Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs Shed More Than $1.1 Billion Globally Last Week
contentSnippet: Bitcoin and Ethereum funds bleed $1.17 billion as rate cut hopes fade, but Solana bucks the trend with massive inflows.

title: Coinbase to Debut Digital Token Offering Platform with Monad Token Sale
contentSnippet: Layer-1 network Monad is set to be the first to conduct a sale on Coinbase’s new digital token offering platform.

title: Bank of England Proposes £20,000 Cap on Retail Stablecoin Holdings
contentSnippet: The central bank proposed temporary caps and new reserve rules for stablecoins as it moves to integrate digital money.

title: Morning Minute: Crypto Booms as US Government Reopening Looms
contentSnippet: Odds of the government shutdown ending this week have rocketed and markets are responding. Plus Trump's new stimulus package doesn't hurt.

title: Trump-Backed World Liberty Financial Token Surges as Senate Moves to End US Government Shutdown
contentSnippet: World Liberty Financial's WLFI token is leading the crypto market rally in a “momentum play" an analyst told Decrypt.

title: ステーブルコインの正式認可を背景に、通貨の新時代をテーマとした金融カンファレンス「MoneyX（マネーエックス）」開催決定
contentSnippet: MoneyX 2026年2月27日開催、日本円建ステーブルコインの社会実装を議論する次世代金融カンファレンスが発表された。WebX実行委員会主催、JPYC・Progmat・SBI・CoinPost企画運営。参加無料、オフライン限定。

title: メタマスクのガス代とは？初心者向けに仕組みと節約方法をわかりやすく解説
contentSnippet: メタマスクで暗号資産を送金する際に必要な「ガス代」を初心者向けに解説。イーサリアム、Polygon、Solanaなど各ネットワークで必要なトークンの違いや、リアルタイム確認方法、手数料を節約するコツまで図解付きでわかりやすく紹介します。

title: WebX 2025開催記念、ショートフィルム『#ThinkFuture』シリーズを公開
contentSnippet: 未来への問いかけ大型カンファレンス「WebX2025」の開催を記念して制作されたショートフィルム『#ThinkFuture』シリーズが、CoinPostとあたらしい経済が共同運営するYouTubeチャンネル「WebXSTUDIO」で公開され...

title: 音楽業界初のIEO「Fanpla」販売結果は申込倍率9倍に　11日にコインチェックで取引開始
contentSnippet: 国内9例目、音楽業界初のIEOとなったFanpla（FPL）の販売結果が発表された。申込倍率は9.06倍、申込総額は90.6億円に達し、28,523口座が参加。11月11日に取引開始予定。

title: 米CFTC代行委員長、レバレッジ付き仮想通貨現物取引の導入を推進
contentSnippet: 米CFTCのファム委員長代行が、レバレッジ付き仮想通貨現物取引を来月にも開始する方向で調整中と確認。CMEやコインベースなど規制取引所と協議を進め、長年禁止されてきたレバレッジ現物取引を「管理」へ移行させる規制上の節目に。

title: 5つのXRP現物ETFが上場準備完了、11月中の米国デビューなるか
contentSnippet: フランクリン・テンプルトンなど大手5社のXRP現物ETFがDTCCに登録完了。11月中の取引開始に向け最終段階、機関投資家の関心高まる。

title: ビットコイン105,500ドルに反発、トランプ給付金案と政府機能回復への期待高まる
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨市場ではビットコインやアルトコイン相場が反発し105,500ドルに。米国で2,000ドルの特別給付案が浮上し、2020年の景気刺激策時のような流動性流入への期待が高まる。政府閉鎖の終息見通しと90億ドルの取引所資金流入も追い風。

title: RWAトークン市場で金（ゴールド）担保型が躍進、機関投資家の関心集まる
contentSnippet: ゴールド価格の上昇を背景に、金担保トークンXAUTの時価総額が30日で39%増の成長を示している。10月にはXAUT専門のトレジャリー企業オーレリオン社が誕生した。

title: 仮想通貨ウォレットのLedger、米国でIPOまたは資金調達を検討＝報道
contentSnippet: ビットコインなど仮想通貨のハードウェアウォレット大手Ledgerが米国でのIPOまたは資金調達を検討。仮想通貨盗難が増加する中、2025年の売上は過去最高を記録している。

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、リップルの770億円調達やジーキャッシュ高騰の背景分析など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナなど主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。
